dcterms:creator: F. M Carlucci
A. D’Innocente
S. Bucci
B. Caputo
T. Tommasi
dcterms:description: PACS consists of 9,991 images of seven classes from four domains - photo, art-painting, cartoon, and sketch. The model is trained on any three of the four domains and tested on the last domain.
dcterms:title: PACS

dcterms:creator: H. Venkateswara
J. Eusebio
S. Chakraborty
S. Panchanathan
dcterms:description: Office-Home has four domains: art, clipart, product, and real-world, containing about 15,500 images of 65 categories for object recognition in office and home environments.
dcterms:title: Office-Home

dcterms:creator: V. Piratla
P. Netrapalli
S. Sarawagi
dcterms:description: Rotated MNIST and Fashion-MNIST datasets are used for evaluating domain generalization by creating five source domains through rotation angles of 15° to 75° and testing on angles of 0° and 90°.
dcterms:title: Rotated MNIST

dcterms:creator: V. Piratla
P. Netrapalli
S. Sarawagi
dcterms:description: Fashion-MNIST is used similarly to Rotated MNIST, with a focus on evaluating domain generalization through rotation.
dcterms:title: Fashion-MNIST
